task.title: Organizing the H-1B Petition
task.shortdesc: The final step in this procedure is organizing the petition for your reviewing attorney.

ol.li: Organize your compiled documents and exhibits into the order that your USCIS cover letter mandates.
Place your Support Letter on top of the compiled exhibits.
Place your USCIS Cover Letter on top of the Support Letter.
Review for any spelling, grammatical, or regulatory errors.
